attributes.action: Install jammers in all prisons to stop mobile use by prisoners
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We would like all prisons to install a cheap and effective device called jammers. This stop all mobiles working and therefore any criminal activity by prisoners who hold a mobile will be stop in thier tracks. This is the most simple solution to stop access in prisons to the outside world, and also criminals organising crime from inside thier cells.
